channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: From scrappy challenger to IPO: Chris Britt brings Chime’s playbook to TechCrunch Disrupt 2025

item.title: Google and PayPal team up on agentic commerce
item.description: PayPal and Google are teaming up on agentic commerce.

item.title: China Turns Legacy Chips Into a Trade Weapon
item.description: As Washington pushes for a TikTok deal, Beijing is countering with probes into American chipmakers.

item.title: Political Influencers Are Ramping Up Security—and Posting Through It

item.title: How to Trade In or Sell Your iPhone (2025)
item.description: If you plan to upgrade to one of Apple’s new models, don’t forget to cash in on your old one.

item.title: This Microsoft Entra ID Vulnerability Could Have Been Catastrophic

item.title: Nvidia buys $5 billion stake in Intel, planning AI chip collaboration

item.title: US House committee summons CEOs of Discord, Twitch, Reddit to testify on online radicalization
item.description: The House Oversight Committee has requested that the CEOs of Discord, gaming platform Steam, Twitch, and Reddit testify on October 8th about online ra...

item.title: 25 Amazon Prime Perks You Might Not Be Using (2025)
item.description: Your membership gets you more than free two-day shipping. Here’s what you may be missing ahead of Amazon Prime Big Deal Days 2025.
